name: Nofollow External Links (SEO)
author: Mitali, Viitorcloud

sections.description:
It automatically set all external links to “nofollow” in website content.

Seo friendly.

Plugin Functionality:

1) Activate it from backend and it will automatically add nofollow in external links used in content.

2) No additional settings required.

Get Involved

ViitorCloud believes in an active community support so with such plugins we try to make life easy for developers & of course customers. Don’t forget to subscribe our newsletter.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation, you can go through wordpress post/page backend.
